code: import React from'react';import{Lightbulb}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QuickTips=()=>{const tips=['Check the date — old stories often resurface as breaking news.','Look for an author and bio — anonymity can signal low credibility.','Scan for sources — credible articles link to primary documents.','Compare headlines to body — clickbait titles often overstate the content.'];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white rounded-lg border border-blue-200 p-4 mt-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-2 mb-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Lightbulb,{className:"w-4 h-4 text-blue-700"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"text-sm font-semibold text-blue-900",children:"Quick Tips"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-disc list-inside text-sm text-blue-800 space-y-1",children:tips.map((t,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:t},i))})]});};export default QuickTips;
